MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the LL53 Uwch Mynydd area of Pwllheli. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:57am and our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:04am on 30th October 2020.
